verbs.description: As [ARG1: the strains of " The Star - Spangled Banner "] [V: began] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House Easter egg roll] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , Melania and Barron Trump dutifully put their right hands over their hearts , as tradition calls for them to do .

[ARGM-TMP: As the strains of " The Star - Spangled Banner " began at the White House Easter egg roll on Monday] , [ARG0: Melania and Barron Trump] [ARGM-MNR: dutifully] [V: put] [ARG1: their right hands] [ARG2: over their hearts] , [ARGM-ADV: as tradition calls for them to do] .

As the strains of " The Star - Spangled Banner " began at the White House Easter egg roll on Monday , Melania and Barron Trump dutifully put their right hands over their hearts , as [ARG0: tradition] [V: calls] [ARG1: for them to do] .
